item_category: Featuring ultra-slim 4.9 mm side bezels and 80% screen-to-body ratio, the HUAWEI MatePad T 8 gives you ample on-screen room for immersive entertainment. A perfect tablet for watching your favourite movies and reading e-Books on the go.
review_text: If you want all your favourite Apps from Google play, forget it! Huawei won't let you. I will never buy a Huawei again, phone or tablet.
A nice bit of kit, looks and feels good, but hugely disappointing without Google Play access.
